mapper.select: select f.id, f.user_id, f.friend_id, u.account, u.display_name, u.phone_number, f.comment_name from friend f join user u on f.friend_id = u.id where f.user_id = #{userId} and f.relation_status = #{relationStatus} and f.deleted = 0 and u.deleted = 0

select f.id, f.user_id, f.friend_id, u.account, u.display_name, u.phone_number, f.comment_name, m.unread_message_count from user u, friend f left join (select count(m.receiver_id) as unread_message_count, m.sender_id, m.receiver_id from message m where m.receiver_id = #{userId} and m.read_status = #{readStatus} group by sender_id, receiver_id) as m on f.friend_id = m.sender_id and f.user_id = m.receiver_id where f.friend_id = u.id and f.user_id = #{userId} and f.relation_status = #{relationStatus} and f.deleted = 0 and u.deleted = 0 order by m.unread_message_count desc
